test-document-for-convdoc

April 14, 2025 • by Your Name

Check 1, 2 …. 2

Summary

A quick test of the word doc based blog to markdown based Jekyll blog

What I want to talk about

Building a fully automated pipeline that lets me create blogs in Microsoft word and then have those automagically convert into a Jekll blog seems like a good idea to me. Out of this I should be able to use most of the content I’ve already created alongside
